gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Celtics 118, Hornets 104
gameRecap.excerpt: The Celtics defeated the Hornets, 118-104. Sam Hauser recorded 25 points (7-11 3PM) and five rebounds for the Celtics, with Jayson Tatum adding 25 points, 10 rebounds, and four assists in the victory. Miles Bridges tallied 26 points, 11 rebounds, and eight assists for the Hornets in the losing effort. The Celtics improve to 59-16, while the Hornets fall to 18-57.
